author: mturk
msg: Add JkMountFile directive. This enables to dynamically add or remove
uri mappings without restarting apache. To disable uri mapping add a
minus '-' sign in front of mapping.

author: mturk
msg: Add functions for dynamic loading of uriworkermap files. Default
interval is 60 s. If file is modified then reload its content and update

author: mturk
msg: Return modification time to the caller. Do not set directly to shmem
because we can open any property file not just workers.properties.

author: mturk
msg: Be more informant when displaying uri maps.

author: mturk
msg: Remove shared memory uri mappings. Dynamic update will not work
for multi child servers. Updates will be done rereading uriworkermap
